## Experiment

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars) + 
  aes(x = wt, y = mpg, color = factor(am)) + 
  geom_rug() + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(orientation = "y", 
              method = lm,
              formula = y ~ 1)

ggplot(mtcars) + 
  aes(x = wt, y = 1) + 
  geom_rug() + 
  geom_smooth(orientation = "y", 
              method = lm,
              formula = y ~ 1)


ggplot(mtcars) + 
  aes(x = wt, y = 1) + 
  geom_rug() + 
  geom_smooth(orientation = "y", 
              method = lm,
              formula = y ~ 1)


ggplot(mtcars) + 
  aes(x = wt) +
  geom_rug() + 
  geom_vline()

ggplot(mtcars) + 
  aes(x = wt, y = 0) +
  geom_rug()


mean_wt <- data.frame(cyl = c(4, 6, 8), wt = c(2.28, 3.11, 4.00))
p + geom_hline(aes(yintercept = wt), mean_wt)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, wt, colour = wt)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = wt, colour = wt), mean_wt) +
  facet_wrap(~ cyl)


ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, wt, colour = wt)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = wt, colour = wt), mean_wt) +
  facet_wrap(~ cyl)


```
